name: RedMimicry Winnti Playbook Dropped File
description: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`file.path:(*gthread\-3.6.dll* OR *sigcmm\-2.4.dll* OR *\\Windows\\Temp\\tmp.bat*)`
